name: Read Calendar
description: Allows the app to read events from your calendar.

name: Write Calendar
description: Allows the app to add or modify events in your calendar.

name: Camera
description: Allows the app to access your camera.

name: Read Contacts
description: Allows the app to read your contacts.

name: Write Contacts
description: Allows the app to add or modify your contacts.

name: Fine Location
description: Allows the app to access your precise location.

name: Coarse Location
description: Allows the app to access your approximate location.

name: Record Audio
description: Allows the app to record audio.

name: Read Phone State
description: Allows the app to access your phone's state information.

name: Call Phone
description: Allows the app to initiate phone calls without user intervention.

name: Read Call Log
description: Allows the app to read your call log.

name: Write Call Log
description: Allows the app to add or modify your call log.

name: Process Outgoing Calls
description: Allows the app to monitor and process outgoing calls.

name: Send SMS
description: Allows the app to send SMS messages.

name: Receive SMS
description: Allows the app to receive SMS messages.

name: Read External Storage
description: Allows the app to read from external storage.

name: Write External Storage
description: Allows the app to write to external storage.

name: Access Network State
description: Allows the app to view the state of all networks.

name: Access WiFi State
description: Allows the app to view the state of WiFi connections.

name: Change Network State
description: Allows the app to change the state of network connections.

name: Change WiFi State
description: Allows the app to change the state of WiFi connections.

name: Bluetooth
description: Allows the app to connect to Bluetooth devices.

name: Bluetooth Admin
description: Allows the app to configure local Bluetooth devices.

name: Wake Lock
description: Allows the app to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

name: Accessibility Service
description: Allows the app to access accessibility features.

name: Voice Interaction
description: Allows the app to interact with the user via voice commands.
